INSERT INTO rookie.UserStock (USER_ID, AAPL, AMZN, FB, GOOGL, MSFT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{AAPL}, #{AMZN}, #{FB}, #{GOOGL}, #{MSFT}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE AAPL = AAPL + VALUES(AAPL), AMZN = AMZN + VALUES(AMZN), FB = FB + VALUES(FB), GOOGL = GOOGL + VALUES(GOOGL), MSFT = MSFT + VALUES(MSFT);

INSERT INTO rookie.UserStock (USER_ID, AAPL, AMZN, FB, GOOGL, MSFT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{AAPL}, #{AMZN}, #{FB}, #{GOOGL}, #{MSFT}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE AAPL = CASE WHEN AAPL + VALUES(AAPL) >= 0 THEN AAPL + VALUES(AAPL) ELSE AAPL END, AMZN = CASE WHEN AMZN + VALUES(AMZN) >= 0 THEN AMZN + VALUES(AMZN) ELSE AMZN END, FB = CASE WHEN FB + VALUES(FB) >= 0 THEN FB + VALUES(FB) ELSE FB END, GOOGL = CASE WHEN GOOGL + VALUES(GOOGL) >= 0 THEN GOOGL + VALUES(GOOGL) ELSE GOOGL END, MSFT = CASE WHEN MSFT + VALUES(MSFT) >= 0 THEN MSFT + VALUES(MSFT) ELSE MSFT END;
